author: Adrian Collins
description:
The extraordinarily talented grimdark author Anna Smith Spark, writing in the world of Judge Dredd? Anderson Versus Death jumped on to our reading list the second we heard about it. What an awesome combination. We’re are so excited to bring you an exclusive cover reveal of Anna’s latest work to whet your appetites for when Anderson Versus Death […]

title: EXCLUSIVE: Cover Reveal of Anderson Versus Death by Anna Smith Spark
